Phrase: Victoria's bold leap into the large door led to a spiral staircase made of stone.

Victoria demonstrated a beautiful jumping kick motion called 'Jumping Lucy Kick', but the intelligent and industrial Yoshino opened the door manually, sending her headlong into the darkness. She seems to have managed to survive thanks to her physical strength and athletic ability.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: I took the plunge quite boldly, but fortunately I only suffered minor injuries. It seems my daily training has paid off.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Non non, that's no minor injury! Your head is bleeding!! Here, hold still while I heal you...

Name: Victoria
Phrase: There is no problem. Head wounds can look a bit exaggerated as they bleed easily.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: My arms and legs are still functional. They are fit for duty.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Of course not! You can't fool my eyes, they're full of fresh wounds.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: There's no end to the treatment for wounds of this magnitude. Please save your healing kit and magic for Lady Paddington.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: I'll be fine. I didn't use this much magic.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooooh- An assault gorilla and a magic gorilla are contesting for power.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It's strange... how high this is. You suddenly plunge out into the dark and then you rolled down this far?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: She's something else, the maid of the house of Elrond...

Name: Putra
Phrase: No, don't think too seriously.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Dear Conductor, may I make a suggestion, Sir?
From what I've seen so far, I'm not very hopeful about your suggestion, but, whatever, just say it.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Strange voices are heard from below this stone tower. Why don't we start our investigation at the bottom, instead of heading upwards?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Voices, you mean...?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Did you hear them, Miss Versailles?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: No, I don't. Do you hear anything, Conductor?
I don't hear any voices, but... I can certainly feel the presence of people from below. Is it a human presence, or is it more like magic?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Or a grudge.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Okaaaaaaaay! Please refrain from making occult jokes or anything that might interfere with the strategy meeeeeeeting!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Reaction just as Yoshino wanted. This mission is full of the kind of stuff Yakky-tan doesn't like.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: If the Hole we just entered is on the ground floor, then beyond this point is the basement.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: It's a bit of an unusual structure for a castle, isn't it? It's more like a fortress than a castle.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: There are important secrets hidden below castles and mansions. You might find an armoury, a torture chamber or some other special room.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Incidentally, in the basement of Elrond's house is the private love nest of Lady Paddington and myself.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: 'Whaaaaaat!? Love nest!? The house of Elrond have those!?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Queensway, what is a love nest?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: W-Well, a love nest is a place called...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Y-You'll have to ask Miss Yakutsk about that!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: You're too young, too naïve to be a louse yet.

Name: Putra
Phrase: You meant 'spouse', not 'louse', a 'louse' is an insect.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: 'I don't know if there is a love nest here, but as Victoria said, there is something in the basement of this stone tower. Maybe the reason the door's magical in nature was to hide whatever's here.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: And I don't think the 'voice' Victoria heard is something that can be overlooked. I think we need to be sure, even if it's a trap.
Then, as Victoria suggested. Let's check underground first.
It is quite dark, so be careful where you step. Also, make sure we have a clear exit route in case of Phantom Mist inside the stone tower.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Hey, if we look carefully, there's candle stands on the wall. Why don't we just light them here? Let's give it a go Yoshino.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It's up to Yoshino, the ignition woman. Yoshino'll show you the Nishiki special fox fire.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Let us light the candles, here and there~♪
Yoshino uses her magic to light the candlestick on the wall. Usually this should be able to light the candle...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: A-re?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It went out. Wasn't there enough fire power?

Name: Victoria
Phrase: Why don't you try imagining it exploding instead of igniting?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Hold up, don't teach our Yoshino such dangerous things.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: It's better not to use very potent magic or sorcery. The candlestick showed no reaction at all to Yoshino's fire. Perhaps this candlestick is also enchanted to be immune to magic and sorcery.
Meaning we have to proceed in the dark. We have no choice, let's go down the stairs with only the light we have. Vivienne and Yoshino, prepare enough lights for all of us.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: About that, Conductor...
What's wrong? Is there a problem?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Oui, how do I put this... I put these lights on with my magic and... they're nearly going out.

Name: Victoria
Phrase: That's why I told you to conserve your magic power. You shouldn't have used your my magic to stop the bleeding in my head and...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: It's not like that. I can use magic. But I just can't keep this light on.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It's the same with Yoshino. The fires Yoshino can cast doesn't go out in the rain, but it's getting smaller and smaller.
While this was going on, the light from the light fixtures that Vivienne and Yoshino were holding got smaller and smaller until it went out completely.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: It's getting all dark now, isn't it?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: This makes us have to think a bit about whether we want to go on or not.

Name: Putra
Phrase: It's still scary in the dark, isn't it?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: No, it's not that, it's just that we don't want to encounter any magic-repelling contraptions. There's Mist in this castle too, so it would be a problem if we couldn't use magic in case of emergency, wouldn't it?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: That doesn't seem to be a problem. It seems like we can use magic for everything except lighting things up. See? Victoria's bleeding has finally stopped.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: So, if we just put up with the darkness, we should be able to get by. What do you think, Yakutsk-san? Are you ready?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: W-What!? Of course I can go. As long as you can cast magic, that's all that matters. Not that I'm afraid or anything!
-That's great. You're not afraid of me, are you?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Woooooooooah!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooooh- Yakky-tan's falling down the stairs.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: But more importantly, did you hear that? Did you hear a woman's voice coming from underground?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I heard it! 'You're not afraid of me, are you?'

Name: Victoria
Phrase: That's the first voice I heard too. I knew there was something underground.
- Please come this way. Release me and I will light the lamp for you.
Come on, down the stairs to the basement.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I suppose we'll have to go.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Right. We have to pick up the fallen Yakky.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: This is most likely a trap... Could the demon that controls the lights be waiting for us...?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: If only Miyako were here at a time like this...
